::Kluster::

Kluster shakes his head. "No, they arn't useless. You still use the 
knowledge every day, but its not like they taught you. You'll learn 
soon, don't worry."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Tarantopulous: That makes me think that all of those years were 
worthless,
> though. That I shouldn't have ever done it...
